lines.text: If you're gonna talk to something dead, at least talk to Abraham Lincoln.
Why is Aunt Violet making such a big stink about me living with you?
Oh, I don't know, but in the two years since your mom has died, Aunt Violet has run out of people to pester. It's just our turn.
Excuse me, sir. What do you and your wife talk about?
About the ever-widening socioeconomic chasm that exists between the classes in this country.
